resources.string: Notification Dictionary is an application to display meaning of selected word as notification from all apps that support text selection. The app works offline and uses Wikitionary as a database for meanings. Wikitionary is an open source project without which the app will not be possible. The logo was made possible thanks to liberal Apache license of material design icons. Thanks to all the open source projects that helped in the application development
Do you want to change the language and download database if not present?
